title: GROUP HYPNOSIS * Dr. Marco Paret in Russia * Non-verbal Hypnosis
description:
These images are from Dr. Marco Paret's Masterclass in Russia. Here he is demonstrating a group hypnosis with his students, guiding them thru all of the steps for entering in a deep hypnotic state. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
